title: The Nicole Arbour Of The Skies Thinks ‘Fat People’ Should Pay A Tax To Fly
text:
The Nicole Arbour Of The Skies Thinks ‘Fat People’ Should Pay A Tax To Fly 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
In 2010, jorts spokesperson Kevin Smith was booted off a Southwest flight for being too “fat.” He live-tweeted the entire embarrassing e...
